findings.title: Ownership can be renounced
findings.description: The contract `Ownable.sol` has the function `renounceOwnership()` which can leave the contract without an owner, compromising its management and making unclaimed funds unrecoverable.

findings.title: Missing validation of the token address
findings.description: The constructor isn’t hard-wired for the governance token, increasing reusability but also increasing the risk that deployment must be repeated.

findings.title: Gas Optimization: use the solidity 0.8 new data type named `Errors` in `revert` operations
findings.description: The cost of the `revert` operation is proportional to the string length passed as parameter. Solidity 0.8 introduced another way of reporting errors, which incurs in less gas usage.
